original: @267a * // dpal he ru ka 'khor dang bcas pa la bstod ba bzhugs /
analyzed: @267a * // dpal he ru ka 'khor dang bcas pa la bstod ba bzhugs /
translated: Praise to Glorious Heruka and His retinue

original: * // rgyal ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: * // rgyal ba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Victor's body.

original: sku mdog sngon po cher 'bar ba'i //
analyzed: sku mdog sngon po cher 'bar ba'i //
translated: Blue in color, greatly blazing,

original: 'jigs byed mche ba gtsigs pa po //
analyzed: 'jigs byed mche ba gtsigs pa po //
translated: Frightening, with bared fangs,

original: g-yas ser g-yon ljang rgyab zhal dkar //
analyzed: g-yas ser g-yon ljang rgyab zhal dkar //
translated: Right yellow, left green, and white face in back,

original: mnyam med sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mnyam med sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the incomparable body.üîΩLord of the Tathagata family,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bdag / rigs btsun @267b rig ma mgul nas 'khyud //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bdag / rigs btsun @267b rig ma mgul nas 'khyud //
translated: Embraced by the pure-lineage knowledge-woman,

original: dbu la rigs kyi bdag po bzhugs //
analyzed: dbu la rigs kyi bdag po bzhugs //
translated: The lord of the family residing on his head,

original: bde chen sku la phyag 'tshal lo //üîΩsgeg dang dpa' byad 'jigs su rung //
analyzed: bde chen sku la phyag 'tshal lo // sgeg dang dpa' byad 'jigs su rung //
translated: I pay homage to the body of great bliss.üîΩPlayful, heroic, frightening,

original: drag dang dgod dang 'jigs par byed //
analyzed: drag dang dgod dang 'jigs par byed //
translated: Wrathful, laughing, terrifying,

original: snying rje rngam dang zhi ba la //
analyzed: snying rje rngam dang zhi ba la //
translated: Compassionate, terrifying, peaceful,

original: nyams dgu yon tan khyod la 'dud //
analyzed: nyams dgu yon tan khyod la 'dud //
translated: I bow to you, whose qualities are the nine expressions.

original: nam mkha'i 'od kyis khebs mdzad cing //
analyzed: nam mkha'i 'od kyis khebs mdzad cing //
translated: You cover with the light of space,

original: 'jigs pa po yang 'jigs par mdzad //
analyzed: 'jigs pa po yang 'jigs par mdzad //
translated: You frighten even the frightening,

original: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
translated: Adorned with the five symbolic ornaments,

original: bde gshegs sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bde gshegs sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the Sugata's body.

original: g-yas g-yon dang po mda' dang gzhu //
analyzed: g-yas g-yon dang po mda' dang gzhu //
translated: The first right and left hands hold a bow and arrow.

original: lhag mthong pa kha tv'am 'dzin //
analyzed: lhag mthong pa kha tv'am 'dzin //
translated: The insight hand holds a kha·π≠vƒÅ·πÖga.

original: mgo phreng brgya phyed do shal byas //
analyzed: mgo phreng brgya phyed do shal byas //
translated: He wears a necklace of a hundred human heads.

original: mgon po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mgon po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you, protector.

original: dbu skra kham pa gyen du bsgreng //
analyzed: dbu skra kham pa gyen du bsgreng //
translated: His tawny hair bristles upward.

original: ka p'a la lngas dbu la brgyan //
analyzed: ka p'a la lngas dbu la brgyan //
translated: His head is adorned with five skull-cups.

original: na ra stong g-yogs stag lpags bsnams //
analyzed: na ra stong g-yogs stag lpags bsnams //
translated: He wears a tiger-skin skirt and a garland of heads.

original: 'jigs rung khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: 'jigs rung khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
translated: Homage to you, the terrifying one.üîΩThe supreme nature of all things,

original: dngos po'i rang bzhin kun gyi mchog / sku la mtshan dang dpe byad rdzogs //
analyzed: dngos po'i rang bzhin kun gyi mchog / sku la mtshan dang dpe byad rdzogs //
translated: his body complete with the major and minor marks,

original: 'gro ba'i don ni mdzad pa po //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don ni mdzad pa po //
translated: he is the one who acts for the benefit of migrators.

original: sku gsum bdag nyid khyod la 'dud //
analyzed: sku gsum bdag nyid khyod la 'dud //
translated: I bow to you, the embodiment of the three buddha bodies.

original: khyod kyi ye shes spyan zur gyis //
analyzed: khyod kyi ye shes spyan zur gyis //
translated: With the sidelong glance of your wisdom eye

original: mi mthun phyogs rnams skrag mdzad cing //
analyzed: mi mthun phyogs rnams skrag mdzad cing //
translated: you terrify the discordant factors

original: rgyal mtshan dril bus slar gso mdzad //
analyzed: rgyal mtshan dril bus slar gso mdzad //
translated: and revive them with the victory banner and the bell.

original: thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
translated: Homage to you, the compassionate one.

original: sku gsum ye shes lnga bdag nyid //
analyzed: sku gsum ye shes lnga bdag nyid //
translated: The embodiment of the three buddha bodies and five wisdoms,

original: bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi gtso //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi gtso //
translated: the chief of all the sugatas,

original: 'gro ba'i mi shes gcod pa po //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i mi shes gcod pa po //
translated: you are the one who severs the ignorance of migrators.

original: stong nyid snying po khyod la 'dud //
analyzed: stong nyid snying po khyod la 'dud //
translated: I bow to you, the essence of emptiness.üîΩThe buddhas, bodhisattvas,

original: sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams dang // de nyid brtan par g-yo bcas pa //üîΩkhams gsum 'di dag thams cad kyi //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams dang // de nyid brtan par g-yo bcas pa // khams gsum 'di dag thams cad kyi //
translated: and the steadfast ones with movement,üîΩI bow to you, the great being

original: bdag nyid chen po khyod la 'dud //
analyzed: bdag nyid chen po khyod la 'dud //
translated: of all these three realms.

original: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel byed cing //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel byed cing //
translated: You dispel the suffering of beings

original: phun sum tshogs pa kun ster pa //
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa kun ster pa //
translated: and bestow all that is excellent.

original: byang chub lam ni ston pa po //
analyzed: byang chub lam ni ston pa po //
translated: You reveal the path to enlightenment.

original: ye shes sku khyod phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: ye shes sku khyod phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, the wisdom kƒÅya.

original: bsam med dpe dang bral bas brjod du med //
analyzed: bsam med dpe dang bral bas brjod du med //
translated: Inconceivable and beyond analogy, inexpressible,

original: bde chen sku ste mi 'gyur 'dus ma byas //
analyzed: bde chen sku ste mi 'gyur 'dus ma byas //
translated: the great bliss kƒÅya, unchanging and unconditioned,

original: dngos dang dngos med rnam spangs dmigs pa med //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med rnam spangs dmigs pa med //
translated: free from existence and nonexistence, without reference point,

original: bde chen rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: bde chen rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, the vajra dakini of great bliss.

original: shar phyogs lha mo rdo rje'i rigs //
analyzed: shar phyogs lha mo rdo rje'i rigs //
translated: The goddess of the east, the vajra family,

original: byams pa'i bdag nyid sku mdog sngo //
analyzed: byams pa'i bdag nyid sku mdog sngo //
translated: with a blue body, the nature of love,üîΩthe earth element, the lord of mirror-like wisdom‚Äî

original: sa khams me long ye shes bdag / rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: sa khams me long ye shes bdag / rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise you, Vajra dakini.

original: lho phyogs lha mo rin chen rigs //
analyzed: lho phyogs lha mo rin chen rigs //
translated: The goddess of the south, the jewel family,

original: snying rje'i bdag nyid sku mdog ser //
analyzed: snying rje'i bdag nyid sku mdog ser //
translated: The nature of compassion, yellow in color,

original: chu khams mnyam @268a * //
analyzed: chu khams mnyam @268a * //
translated: The water element, the nature of equanimity,

original: nyid ye shes bdag / rin chen mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: nyid ye shes bdag / rin chen mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: Jewel dakini, I pay homage and praise.

original: nub phyogs lha mo padma'i rigs //
analyzed: nub phyogs lha mo padma'i rigs //
translated: The goddess of the west, of the lotus family,

original: dga' ba'i bdag nyid sku mdog dkar //
analyzed: dga' ba'i bdag nyid sku mdog dkar //
translated: The nature of joy, white in color,

original: me khams so sor rtog rang bzhin //
analyzed: me khams so sor rtog rang bzhin //
translated: The fire element, the nature of discernment,

original: padma mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: padma mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: Lotus dakini, I pay homage and praise.

original: byang phyogs lha mo las kyi rigs//
analyzed: byang phyogs lha mo las kyi rigs//
translated: The goddess of the north, of the karma family,

original: btang snyoms rang bzhin sku mdog ljang //
analyzed: btang snyoms rang bzhin sku mdog ljang //
translated: The nature of equanimity, green in color,

original: rlung khams bya ba grub rang bzhin //
analyzed: rlung khams bya ba grub rang bzhin //
translated: The wind element, the nature of successful activity,

original: sna tshogs mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: sna tshogs mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: Diverse dakini, I pay homage and praise.

original: thams cad zhal bzhi phyag bzhi ma //
analyzed: thams cad zhal bzhi phyag bzhi ma //
translated: All of them have four faces and four arms,

original: phyag na rang rang mtshan ma 'dzin //
analyzed: phyag na rang rang mtshan ma 'dzin //
translated: Holding their individual emblems in their hands,

original: mtshan dang dpe byad sku la rdzogs //
analyzed: mtshan dang dpe byad sku la rdzogs //
translated: The major and minor marks complete on their bodies,

original: rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the buddhas of the five families.

original: sku la 'od kyi phreng ba 'phro //
analyzed: sku la 'od kyi phreng ba 'phro //
translated: Light rays radiate from their bodies,

original: mi mgo khrag 'dzag do shal byas //
analyzed: mi mgo khrag 'dzag do shal byas //
translated: With a necklace of human heads dripping with blood,

original: zhabs gnyis nyi mar phyed krung bzhugs //
analyzed: zhabs gnyis nyi mar phyed krung bzhugs //
translated: Seated with two legs in half-lotus on the sun,

original: 'khor gyi lha mo phyag 'tshal bstod //üîΩphyag rgya rnam pa lnga dang ldan //
analyzed: 'khor gyi lha mo phyag 'tshal bstod // phyag rgya rnam pa lnga dang ldan //
translated: I pay homage and praise the retinue goddesses.üîΩPossessing the five mudras,

original: ka p'a la lngas dbu la brgyan //
analyzed: ka p'a la lngas dbu la brgyan //
translated: Adorned with five kapalas on the head,

original: sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan //
analyzed: sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan //
translated: Possessing the experience of gracefulness,

original: lha mo'i 'khor la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: lha mo'i 'khor la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the retinue of goddesses.

original: rje btsun 'khor dang bcas pa la //
analyzed: rje btsun 'khor dang bcas pa la //
translated: To the venerable one and retinue,

original: bdag gis bstod pa'i bsod nams kyis //
analyzed: bdag gis bstod pa'i bsod nams kyis //
translated: Through the merit of my praises,

original: sems can kun gyis rje btsun gyi //
analyzed: sems can kun gyis rje btsun gyi //
translated: May all sentient beings attainüîΩThe unsurpassed state of the venerable one.

original: go 'phang bla med thob par shog / rje btsun dpal he ru ka 'khor dang bcas pa'i bstod pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: go 'phang bla med thob par shog / rje btsun dpal he ru ka 'khor dang bcas pa'i bstod pa rdzogs so//
translated: The praise of the glorious Heruka, the venerable one, and retinue is complete.
